Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2015.2.2 (Build 805U)

Class.name: EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.Boolean
Class.Description: Use Cache rules to validate a boolean value. An empty string equates to 0/false and is valid.

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
set attribute = ..init(parameters) quit:attribute.hasErrors() attribute
set value = attribute.value if $get(value) = "" set value = 0 set value = $mvoconv(value, "MCN") if (value=0)!(value=1) quit attribute
do attribute.addError("Value must be ""true"" or ""false"".")
quit attribute
